title: Person Responsible For The Articles (Part 2)
body:
Person Responsible For The Articles (Part 2)

"I know that woman is petty, but do you think I am stupid enough to believe she used this kind of cheap trick to deal with me"

"She is an A+ rank hunter for god's sake, do you think she is free enough to think about publishing some stupid articles," Evan asked barely holding himself back to smack Jack's head.

Seeing Evan was pissed off Jack started to sweat and quickly said

"I know it sounds ridiculous, but believe me, I heard Annie talking about it with my ears. As you know she joined Oliva's guild not long ago."

"I went to meet her last month and accidentally heard her talking about it with her friends"

'From the way he is talking it doesn't seem like he is lying' Evan thought and arched his eyebrows.

'It doesn't make sense for Oliva to go out of her way and do something like this. Is she really the one behind those articles?'
